SELECT MR.ROUTING_ID , MR.ROUTING_NM , MR.ROUTING_SHORT_NM , MR.DESCRIPTION , MR.COMPANY_CD , MR.DIVISION_CD , ROWIDTOCHAR(MR.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ROUTING MR WHERE MR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (UPPER(MR.ROUTING_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MR.ROUTING_SHORT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MR.ROUTING_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM MOM_ROUTING_PATH MRP , MOM_OPERATION MO WHERE MRP.COMPANY_CD = MO.COMPANY_CD AND MRP.DIVISION_CD = MO.DIVISION_CD AND MRP.OPERATION_ID = MO.OPERATION_ID AND MRP.COMPANY_CD = MR.COMPANY_CD AND MRP.DIVISION_CD = MR.DIVISION_CD AND MRP.ROUTING_ID = MR.ROUTING_ID AND (MRP.OPERATION_ID LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{operationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR MO.OPERATION_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{operationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'))
AND MR.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MR.ROUTING_ID
